mapper.sql: otid, detail_id, request_id, vendor_id, mrname3, cost, unit, note, comparison_price, specifications3, CHILDREN3_DETAIL, CHILDREN3_VENDOR, CHILDREN3_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN3_COUNT, CHILDREN3_PRICE, CHILDREN3_AMOUNT, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pcms_othertm
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pcms_othertm (otid, detail_id, request_id, vendor_id, mrname3, cost, unit, note, comparison_price, specifications3, CHILDREN3_DETAIL, CHILDREN3_VENDOR, CHILDREN3_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN3_COUNT, CHILDREN3_PRICE, CHILDREN3_AMOUNT, create_time) values (#{otid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mrname3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comparisonPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifications3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children3Detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children3Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children3Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children3Count,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children3Price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children3Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update pcms_othertm

detail_id = #{record.detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_id = #{record.requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vendor_id = #{record.vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pcms_othertm set detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_id = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mrname3 = #{mrname3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comparison_price = #{comparisonPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specifications3 = #{specifications3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN3_DETAIL = #{children3Detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN3_VENDOR = #{children3Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN3_BUILDTIME = #{children3Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN3_COUNT = #{children3Count,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN3_PRICE = #{children3Price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN3_AMOUNT = #{children3Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where otid = #{otid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT b.otid, b.mrname3, '其他终端建设' AS cost, b.CHILDREN3_COUNT, b.CHILDREN3_PRICE, b.CHILDREN3_AMOUNT, b.CHILDREN3_BUILDTIME FROM pcms_item a LEFT JOIN pcms_othertm b ON a.detail_id=b.detail_id WHERE a.itid = #{itid}
